ProviderSqlResource.Select: SELECT [Id],[Name],[Remark],[Enable],[CreateTime],[LastUpdateTime],[City_Id],[AuditState],[AuditRemark],[DepositBank],[BankName],[AccountNumber] ,[BusinessLicense],[ProviderType],[HasCreateYJXAccount],[ProviderProperty],[AgreementBeginTime],[AgreementEndTime],[RequiredAgreement],[DonotTakeupMoney] ,[Head_MobileNO] MobileNO,[Head_Name] Name,[Head_Gender] Gender,[Head_CardNO] CardNo,[Head_PhoneNO] PhoneNO,[Head_Email] Email ,[Address_Province] Province,[Address_City] City ,[Address_County] County,[Address_DetailAddress] DetailAddress,[Address_Latitude] Latitude,[Address_Longitude] Longitude FROM [dbo].[Providers] WITH(NOLOCK)
ProviderSqlResource.Count: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[Providers] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE Id=@id
